name: cisp-platform
description: CISP (Construction IT Solution Portal) - 멀티테넌트 SaaS 플랫폼

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:auth && npm run build:tenant
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:services: npm run test:gateway && npm run test:auth && npm run test:tenant
scripts.lint: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:services: npm run lint:gateway && npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:tenant
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:shared
scripts.clean:services: cd services/gateway && npm run clean || true && cd ../auth && npm run clean || true && cd ../tenant && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend/web && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:shared: cd shared/common-libs && npm run clean || true
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:shared && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed

author: CISP Development Team
